result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam Daniel Ryan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Daniel Ryan is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Adam Daniel Ryan was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).
  • Adam Daniel Ryan was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Habitual Criminality], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).
  • Adam Daniel Ryan was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor [Modifiers: Habitual Criminality], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Conviction mailed to defendant at the Dodge County Jail and was returned marked "return to sender, attempted, not known"
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Adam Daniel Ryan in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 3, Ct. 8, and Ct. 9, Judgment to be entered, Ct. 1 dismissed, Court sentences defendant to: Ct. 3, Ct. 8, and Ct. 9, withheld sentence, probation 2 years, concurrent, Ct. 3, $443.00 costs, AODA and comply, defendant to submit DNA Sample, Ct. 8, $243.00 costs, AODA and comply, defendant to submit DNA Sample, Ct. 9, $243.00 costs, AODA and comply, defendant to submit DNA Sample, defendant to report to probation and parole by 4:00 P.M. today or by Noon on Monday, 6 month probation review to be conducted, 4 days sentence credit,
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus to Dodge County Jail for hearing on 6-24-16 at 2:45 pm.

Defendant Adam Daniel Ryan in court, in custody with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Masana requesting new dates,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 23, 2016 at 02:20 pm.  Return date scheduled for June 24, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus for Dodge County Jail on 4/8/16 at 2:45 P.M.

Defendant Adam Daniel Ryan by video, in custody with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant did not understand the new charges of the amended complaint.  Atty Riek requested a competency evaluation.  Court ordered competency evaluation.  Bond remains.
adding Cts. 8 & 9 bail jumping.
standard misdemeanor conditions

Defendant Adam Daniel Ryan in court, in custody by video with attorney Amanda K. Riek.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. waives reading of complaint, $2,000.00 sign bond, standard misdemeanor conditions,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.  Return date scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 02:45 pm. Atty Riek moves to dismiss bail jumping charges, State requesting to file amended complaint, Court grants dismissal w/out prejudice of the bail jumping
